title: A systematic review of major evaluation metrics for simulator-based automatic assessment of driving after stroke
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Pittawat Taveekitworachai, Gunt Chanmas, Pujana Paliyawan, Ramita Thawonmas, Chakarida Nukoolkit, Piyapat Dajpratham, Ruck Thawonmas
